div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1882 Bruttium, before 1940? Burial: c. 480 B.C. (K) Contents: AR "Gruppetto di didrammi di fabbrica achea" including: Sybaris-Laus: 1 st. (as NC 1958, pl. 3, 11-2) Caulonia: 1 st. (medium incuse, as Noe 49-50) Disposition: Gabrici 1 Caulonia; 2 Sybaris- Laus (1 Oxford, ex Evans; 1 shown BM) published NC 1958, perhaps from this hd. Gabrici, Problemi di num. graeca (Naples, 1959), pp. 50-5, illus.
